response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $15,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
